techmeme.title: Anthropic Chief Product Officer Mike Krieger says the company is preparing enterprise features and discussing voice product launches with "a bunch of partners" (Cristina Criddle/Financial Times)
PitchBook: China led Asia with 715 AI VC deals in 2024, totaling $7.3B, South Korea followed with 308 deals worth $1.8B, and India with 306 deals totaling $1.7B (Nikkei Asia)
A RevenueCat report, covering data from 75K+ mobile apps and $10B+ in revenue across 1B+ transactions, shows most apps fail to reach $1K/month after two years (Scharon Harding/Ars Technica)
San Francisco grants Waymo a temporary permit to map SFO roads with human-driven cars, paving the way for future commercial operations (Kirsten Korosec/TechCrunch)
Starlink is now accessible across the White House campus, which was already served by fiber cable, after service was "donated", as some cite security concerns (New York Times)
